definitions.text: the feeling aroused by something strange and surprising
something that causes feelings of wonder
a state in which you want to learn more about something
have a wish or desire to know something
examples: He wondered who had built this beautiful church

definitions.text: place in doubt or express doubtful speculation
examples: I wonder whether this was the right thing to do
she wondered whether it would snow tonight
We marvelled at the child's linguistic abilities
